text: (nabiyē!) oba ovunṭa niyōga kaḷahot ovunda niyata vaśayenma (yuddhayaṭa) piṭatva yana bavaṭa allāh mata sthīrava divrannāha. oba (ovunṭa) mesē pavasanu: “(mesē) nodivranu. oba avanata vī kaṭayutu kirīma dannā karuṇaki. niyata vaśayenma allāh oba karana dæya hon̆din danneku vaśayenma siṭinnēya”
